implement-wo-135.instruction: Implement the Abstraction Wall as per design/work_orders/WO-135-Abstraction-Wall.md. Key tasks: 1) Create ConfigFactory, 2) Define TypedDicts in api.py, 3) Update DecisionContext, 4) Implement PurityGate v2, 5) Refactor Agent make_decision methods. Ensure existing tests are updated to match new DTO structures.
implement-wo-135.title: WO-135: Operation Abstraction Wall
